page.title: 01Landscape Flintham-Syerston.
page.content:
The land area includes the airfield, 2 villages,{Flintham & Syerston,}both set back half a mile from the Fosse Way. There are woods, spinneys and much pasture. The arable land is grade two, heavy clay or marl base with some good hedges. Many of the fields have been amalgamated. The main{crops}are cereals, rape and potatoes. North of the Fosse Way the land is a little lighter and stonier, dropping down to the{River Trent. The major physical features are Trent Hills, Spring Hill Flintham and Flintham Lake.
.
